import { Meta } from '@storybook/blocks'

<Meta title="Theme/Global Tokens" />

# Global Tokens

Global tokens are a special group that are used within the definition of other tokens. They currently constitute the building blocks behind our [font](?path=/docs/theme-base-tokens--docs) style tokens.

Global tokens are not exported by the theme library.

## Font weight

  <colgroup>
    <col width="200px" />
    <col width="200px" />
    <col width="200px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Example</th>
      <th>Core Token</th>
      <th>Value</th>
      <th>Usage</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ fontWeight: '300' }}>Font weight</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>fontWeight.light</code>
      </td>
      <td>300</td>
      <td>Display text</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ fontWeight: '400' }}>Font weight</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>fontWeight.regular</code>
      </td>
      <td>400</td>
      <td>Body text</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ fontWeight: '600' }}>Font weight</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>fontWeight.semibold</code>
      </td>
      <td>600</td>
      <td>Headings</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ fontWeight: '700' }}>Font weight</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>fontWeight.bold</code>
      </td>
      <td>700</td>
      <td>Heading and bold body text</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

## Text Transform

<table className="wds-token-table">
  <colgroup>
  <col width="200px" />
  <col width="200px" />
  <col width="200px" />
  <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>

  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th>Example</th>
      <th>Core Token</th>
      <th>Value</th>
      <th>Usage</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ textTransform: 'none' }}>Text transform</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>textTransform.none</code>
      </td>
      <td>none</td>
      <td>Default text transform</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ textTransform: 'uppercase' }}>Text transform</p>
      </td>
      <td>
        <code>textTransform.uppercase</code>
      </td>
      <td>uppercase</td>
      <td>Applied to group header</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

## Letter spacing

  <colgroup>
    <col width="100%" />
    <col width="200px" />
    <col width="100%" />
  </colgroup>
  <thead>

      <th>Usage</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ letterSpacing: '0' }}>Text transform</p>
      </td>
      <td>0</td>
      <td>Default letter spacing</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>
        <p style={{ letterSpacing: '0.0625rem' }}>Text transform</p>
      </td>
      <td>0.0625rem</td>
      <td>Applied to group heading</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>
